review: I am very happy with Doctor Venkata Subba Rao as he provided an outstanding consultation. He is very professional, expertise, and genuine care. He took the time to listen to my concerns, explained everything in detail, and he is very comfortable . I highly recommend this doctor to anyone seeking top-notch medical care..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Initially I have taken my mother to show to him, post his treatment I have taken my father also to show 
He is very good doctor with experience
He explains all problems in detail
If we have to find out our problems it is worth waiting to meet him
In recent times no doctor has so much patience to explain in detail
I recommend this doctor
************** patient and caring, Dr.Subba Rao also sticks to his specialisation and refers to his peers for other related issues.
We had been there to show our full body check up reports. Doctor is very good. Finds the root cause of the issue and guides properly in a way that patient understands.
The doctor carefully listens to the problem statement and takes extra effort in explaining the issue. It was my mother’s first visit and I am already feeling very assured.

"I had a wonderful experience with Dr. T.N. Venkata Subba Rao. Not only is he extremely friendly and approachable, but he also listens to his patients with great care and attention. What stood out to me the most was the amount of time he dedicated to discussing my concerns and explaining each step of the treatment process. His depth of knowledge and humility were truly reassuring. I would highly recommend Dr. T.N. Venkata Subba Rao to anyone seeking excellent medical care."Thank you doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor *** ************* *** ** knew the subject well, he gave me the right suggestions and medicines. He explained everything in detail

Dr Venkat had given appointment for my mother who was struggling with high Uric Acid and high glucose but he didnt join on the slots, when i pinged him he wakes up and ask again to wait 30 more minutes, I have waited again but still he didnt join for the call, again I pinged him but no response it took almost 1 hour! he has no respect for others time nor he communicate to patients ****** *** ***** **** **** *********** *****  unless you have lots of free time, nothing else to do.. then pl do reach out to Venkat but surely not when there is a real need! he wont wake up!
reply_text: My apologies Mr. Mathew. Was stuck in an emergency at Manipal Hospital Millers road where I work. I sincerely regret the inconvenience caused.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Sugar Level Check,Fasting blood sugar,High cholesterol,
review: I had slight variations in my sugar levels and cholesterol was on the higher side. I do have a stroke history too. The doctor listened to me very patiently and explained every minute details about the treatment he would advise. He gave a detailed explanation on the importance on taking medicines and how they act to prevent future complications. To avoid noncompliance of medical advices, ignorant people like me definitely needed to be educated on it's importance of following then. He does that absolutely well. Doctors can prescribe medicines, but it is the patient who has to do 100% compliance, for not doing which the doctor cannot be blamed. *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** * **** **** I highly advice this doctor.

Me and my entire family of about more 15ppl are under the supervision of Dr Subbarao for more than ten years now. The way he diagnose the problem and give us a clarity about the issue and the steps need to be taken for future is commendable...... we have never seen a doctor attending phone call and explaining the situation of a patient in such a detailed manner with a lot patience in him. 

I would love to call Mr Rao as an encyclopaedia of medicine where for any problem we go he has a solution....... 

Thanks uncle for the support all these years to us and many people would have the same experience with you indeed.

This is the second time that the doctor failed to show up for his appointment! This is just highly unprofessional and not acceptable. I had come from far off and cancelled my meeting so that I could meet the doctor.

I called him up at sharp 5 pm and he tells me that he's running late by 45mins to an hour because his car broke down or something! The least you could have done is inform the patients or the clinic. He didn't even sound apologetic! 

These doctors though have oodles of experience, just have very fewer regard for peoples' time!

I WOULD NEVER EVER RECOMMEND HIM! For the sheer frustration(twice)

review:

review:
Practo had wrongly provided consultation timings and even though the doctor was not available at that time just because the appointment was booked he came down all the way while I have seen that most of them these days have the habit of either letting the patient know that they wont be available or apologizing and ending up sending back. I was also expecting the same but to my surprise it did not happen. The receptionists were also very helpful. 
Doctor was very friendly. Did not feel like I was meeting him for the first time. *** *** ********* *********** ********* ** ***** *** *** **** **** ** ********** ****** **** ***** *** *** Just after one doze I started feeling very much better.

review: Dr Venkata Subbarao is an excellent physician.He takes enough time to listen to his patients concerns. We had met him to treat my fathers diabetes problem, doctor patiently listened to my dad and took his complete medical history and prescribed the best medicines for the same. My fathers diabetes is now completely under control after taking the medicines prescribed by Dr Rao for a month. Dr Rao made us feel comfortable during the consultation and cleared all of our doubts. We didn’t have to wait long for meeting the doctor. I completely recommend Dr Rao. Thank you so much doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mother is a RA patient. We got her treated in different hospitals all over South India and there was no proper result. I got to know Dr T N Venkata Subba rao sir from my cousin and I took my mother to him. He is basically Diabetic specialist, but still I took my mother and went for consultation. Seeing her condition, he immediately spoke with the concerned dept doctor at Vikram hospital, booked appointment for us and asked us to go and consult him. After that it took almost a year for her to come back to normal condition. Now she is slowly recovering and able to walk, sit and stand on her own. During the first consultation itself the doctor informed us this will take nearly 2-3 years to get cured and as they told I can see the difference in her health.

But I can assure you that if you need correct diagnosis and treatment, I would recommend you to visit Subba Rao sir and take his advise specially if you are diabetic

Regards,
Durga Siva Prasad

Dr subba Rao is a diabetic specialist at Vikram hospitals, Bangalore.
I personally experienced and had lot of conversations with subba Rao sir. He is treating my father, Anantha Ramaiah garu for the last 3yrs and sugar controls are well maintained with his prescription. He is not a one who directly start giving medicine. He ask us to get full body checkup and analyse each and every part and even suggest in other areas too and get diagnosed by other references. That's his speciality.
The fb sessions he is providing now with Sandeep are excellent.
Hopefully you guys will utilise these sessions.

Thanks

I have consulted my Endocrinologists since 2006 about my diabetes. I have not met a doctor except Dr. Venkatasubbarao who is thorough in examination, learning case history, patiently going blood sugar and BP recordings kept by me, checking feet nerve sensations, recommending me to consult ophthalmologist for check up of the eyes and finally recommending correct dosage of medicine to take. Totally satisfied with Dr. Venkatasubbarao' s dedication to the field and he hears patiently and is professional.

review: I had an online consulation with doctor from a different city, I found doctor have a profound knowledge of each of my health issues, I like the way he explained and also about the diet and lifestyle changes,  and the most impressive thing about doctor he was able to analyse the exact termalogy of these health issues and and the validated reason behind these causes such as gastritis, Hyperacidity, constipation, Abdominal pain etc !

Dr Venkatesh is truly brilliant he will analyse you from end to toe and figure out solution ! Albeit your issue could be serious but he makes sure he considers a patient as team member and works towards the progress of the patient!! Amazing experience

He did not complicate the matter and resolved with clear explanation and simple medicine. The only draw back is the clinic where is working from. reply_text:
Thanks for your kind words. Also agree with two  issues you have raised regarding the inconvenience caused. The Accupolyclinic is now bought by DIAGNOSTICA SPAN who have 24 branches all ac( The largest name boards seen on the front wall of the clinic. There is a big lab of theirs upstairs ) 
So ,the whole thing is in a transition stage and will all be set right pretty soon. I do appreciate such frank statements made about the inconveniences you had to face ..This actually helps me and the people concerned,to wake up and speed up things. A special thanks for this .Take care. God bless.

Dr. Subba Rao has been our family physician for over 25 years now. He has two talents that are priceless to a patient:
1. His ability to diagnose the sickness efficiently.
2. His communication: Be it explaining patiently as to what has gone wrong, how bad/good it is, sometimes his recommendation to consult other Doctors is so timely and his knowledge of the current upcoming solutions/treatments has saved me and my family time and money.

I visited Dr. T.N. Venkata Subba Rao for my persistent cough. I listened patiently my case history and could immediately gave the right diagnosis and treatment. It worked well in deed. Strongly recommend him.

review:
I had visited the clinic for multiple heath issues that my Mom and Dad were having. Dr. Venkata Rao went through the initial reports, explained us the issues and causes in detail. Four key points about him that made the entire diagnosis and treatment process easy were:
1. Detailed explanation of issue and linked problems
2. He helped us to decide the priority of further diagnosis and treatment
3. He gave us the right and relevant contacts which helped me to fix relevant appointments and tests
4. He was available on WhatsApp also which helped me inform him certain more health issues that I got to know later.

Dr. T.N Venkata Subba Rao is really an awsome and very much talented and experienced doctor ever met. When we meet doctor, first he takes all the details and talk for almost 40 minutes. He really takes care of the patients as if the patients are his family members. ** ** * ******* ****** * **** **** **** He first listen to the patients then he talks about the treatment. He talks with the patients very much friendly and I suggest u to go for him for any kind of diabetic problems.

review: not so satisfactory . I was given steroids ***** ** ******** **** **** *** * *** ** **** ********** * when asked he told you need to take it as we are referring it to every patient after 7 days.
reply_text:
Sir ,I had prescribed it as per the guidelines of AIIMS & MHA..

The criteria to prescribe ,is Even small  spike of fever ,or rise in CRP ,dip in saturation ,Increased breathing rate per minute ...It can be any of the above and it is the life saving medication in Covid after seven days ,whether a patient is at home or in the hospital...
Sorry that you have not found out the medical facts before making this remark..You could have called me regarding this ,and   I  would have clarified ! 
Take care.
